definition[0]: able to be used for a particular period of time
example[0]: Your passport is good for another three years.
note[0]: good for one month/a year etc
definition[1]: likely to continue living or being useful for a particular time or distance, even though old or not in good condition
example[1]: This old truck is good for another 100,000 miles.
note[1]: good for some time/a hundred miles etc
definition[2]: likely to give you something or provide something
example[2]: Dad should be good for a few bucks.
